entries.original: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/2035 the `npm` release of `@openai/codex` now runs the Rust CLI instead of falling back to the old TypeScript CLI (TypeScript code was removed from the repo in https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/2048)
entries.translated: `@openai/codex`의 `npm` 릴리스가 이제 오래된 TypeScript CLI 대신 Rust CLI를 실행합니다 (TypeScript 코드는 https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/2048에서 저장소에서 제거되었습니다)

entries.original: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/2019 fixes two things for Windows:
entries.translated: Windows에 대한 두 가지 문제를 수정합니다:

entries.original: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/2042 should help/fix the Python certificates issue with `codex login`: https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/2044
entries.translated: `codex login`의 Python 인증서 문제를 해결/도움이 될 것입니다: https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/2044
